name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a seasoned Full Stack Developer with 8 years of experience, I possess a strong foundation in **SAP**, **S/4HANA**, **BW**, and **BTP** integration, enhancing data governance and quality through scalable solutions. My technical expertise extends to **PaaS**, **Data Lakes**, and robust **database** management, driving improvements in data privacy and facilitating effective data cataloging.
I thrive in collaborative environments, leveraging my project management skills to implement value-based selling strategies and conducting ROI analysis for clients. My background in machine learning and cloud experience across **Azure** and **AWS** enables me to deliver high-performance solutions that align with enterprise requirements.
Additionally, I have led the development of platforms using **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django** while ensuring compliance with standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. I have a proven record in CI/CD automation, microservices architecture, and utilizing tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow** to support machine learning pipelines and MLOps workflows.
